title: Trailblazer League/Guide/Herblore

properties.name: description
properties.value: No herb patches are available in the starting area. Players will have a pestle and mortar included in their starting equipment. A player may wish to wear an amulet of chemistry while mixing potions for a 5% chance of obtaining (4) dose potions instead of (3).

content:
Trailblazer League
Guides

Contents

  • 1 Overview
  • 2 Training
    • 2.1 Obtaining herbs
      • 2.1.1 Herb patches
      • 2.1.2 Combat and other
    • 2.2 Obtaining bulk secondary ingredients
  • 3 Potions
    • 3.1 Secondary ingredients locations
    • 3.2 Restrictions
  • 4 Other equipment
  • 5 Temporary boosts
    • 5.1 Skillcape
  • 6 Quests
    • 6.1 XP rewards with skill choice

Overview[edit | edit source]

Main article: Herblore training

No herb patches are available in the starting area. Players will have a pestle and mortar included in their starting equipment. A player may wish to wear an amulet of chemistry while mixing potions for a 5% chance of obtaining (4) dose potions instead of (3).

Herblore is modified by two tier 1 relics.

  • Endless Harvest is not directly beneficial to Herblore training, as it does not improve Farming or other herb gathering activities.
  • Production Master allows players to mix an inventory of potion ingredients instantly.
  • Skilling Prodigy allows players to bypass low-level and low XP content.

Training[edit | edit source]

The most useful potions to create for training purposes are the prayer potion, super attack, super strength, super defence, super restore, and saradomin brew. Alternatively, players may train by creating herb tar although it will be difficult to obtain enough swamp tar to sustain this method.

Water-filled vial packs may be purchased in the starting area from Jiminua's Jungle Store or Obli's General Store, see additional sources.

Zahur may be paid 200 GP per item to clean herbs and create unfinished potions.

Obtaining herbs[edit | edit source]

Herbs are most easily obtained in the starting region from the Herbiboar hunter activity on Fossil Island. Otherwise players will be limited to uncommon monster drops until they are able to unlock additional regions with herb patches or monsters with more common herb drops.

Herb patches[edit | edit source]

Maximum: 6

  • Asgarnia, Kandarin, and Morytania.

Minimum: 0

  • Any combination of Desert, Fremennik, Tirannwn, or Wilderness

The following table lists the number of herb patches available per region:

Region Herb Patches
Misthalin✓ 0
Karamja✓ 0
Asgarnia✓ 2
Fremennik✓ 0
Kandarin✓ 2
Desert✓ 0
Morytania✓ 2
Tirannwn✓ 0
Wilderness✓ 0
Asgarnia✓
Fremennik✓
Kandarin✓		 +1[1]
  1. ^ Requires Making Friends with My Arm, see quest restrictions.

Combat and other[edit | edit source]

The following table lists sources of herbs that are obtainable in high enough quantities to be valid training methods:

Region Method Notes
Misthalin✓ Herbiboar Requires level 80 Hunter. Herb drops scale to Herblore level.
Kandarin✓ Sinister chest Requires level 49 Agility. Provides guaranteed herb loot.
Kandarin✓ Barbarian potions Does not provide herbs, but does allow certain potions to be used as primary ingredients when mixed with caviar for small amounts of Herblore experience. Requires Otto Godblessed's barbarian training.
Tirannwn✓ Zulrah Common high-level herb drops. Common anti-venom ingredient drops.
Wilderness✓ Venenatis Common snapdragon and red spiders' eggs drops.
Asgarnia✓ OR Kandarin✓ OR Morytania✓ OR Wilderness✓ Chaos druids Common herb drops.

Obtaining bulk secondary ingredients[edit | edit source]

The following table lists sources of secondary ingredients that are obtainable in high enough quantities to be valid training methods:

Region Secondary Method Primary
Misthalin✓
Karamja✓ 		Volcanic ash Can be mined from ash piles on Fossil Island at 22 Mining. Harralander
Chocolate dust Can be purchased from the Culinaromancer's Chest. Harralander
Jangerberries
White berries 		Can be grown in bush patches (1) starting with level 48 Farming.
Can be grown in bush patches (1) starting with level 59 Farming. 		Torstol
Cadantine
Crushed nest Can be obtained from bird house trapping on Fossil island. Toadflax
Coconut
Cave nightshade
Poison ivy berries 		Can be grown in the Brimhaven fruit tree patch with level 68 Farming.
Can be grown in the Draynor manor belladonna patch with level 67 Farming.
Can be grown in the bush patch West of the Champions' Guild with level 70 Farming. 		N/A
Asgarnia✓ Eye of newt Can be purchased at Betty's Magic Emporium, Jatix's Herblore Shop, and Frincos' Fabulous Herb Store. Irit
Dragon scale dust Can be collected from ground spawns in the Taverley Dungeon. Lantadyme
Lava scale shard Can be obtained by fishing infernal eels. See the Fishing guide for more information. Antifire
Amylase crystal Can be obtained by spending marks of grace at the Rogues' den. Super energy
Crushed nest Can be obtained by killing the Giant Mole. Toadflax
Wine of zamorak Can be obtained by using telekinetic grab 1 1 with level 33 Magic at the Chaos Temple. Dwarf weed
Snape grass Can be grown in allotment patches (2) with level 61 Farming. Also ground spawns. Ranarr weed
Limpwurt root Can be grown in flower patches (1) with level 26 Farming. Kwuarm
Fremennik✓ Snape grass Waterbirth Island has 27 ground spawns. Ranarr weed
Jangerberries
White berries 		Can be grown in bush patches (1) starting with level 48 Farming.
Can be grown in bush patches (1) starting with level 59 Farming. 		Torstol
Cadantine
Superior dragon bones Dropped by Vorkath. Cannot be used in Herblore without also unlocking the Myths' Guild+. Antifire potion
Kandarin✓ Snape grass Can be grown in allotment patches (4) with level 61 Farming. Ranarr weed
Eye of newt Can be purchased at Grud's Herblore Stall. Irit
Jangerberries
White berries 		Can be grown in bush patches (1) starting with level 48 Farming.
Can be grown in bush patches (1) starting with level 59 Farming. 		Torstol
Cadantine
Limpwurt root Can be grown in flower patches (1) with level 26 Farming. Kwuarm
Unicorn horn dust Can be obtained from unicows at Creature Creation. Irit
Red spiders' eggs Can be obtained from spidines at Creature Creation. Snapdragon
Desert✓ Potato cactus Can be obtained by killing the Kalphite Queen or ground spawns in the Kalphite Hive. Lantadyme
Wine of zamorak Can be obtained by killing the Kalphite Queen. Dwarf weed
Morytania✓ Mort myre fungus Can be spawned in the Mort Myre swamp with a blessed silver sickle. Avantoe
Swamp tar Commonly obtained from the Theatre of Blood in quantities of 500-600. Harralander
Snape grass Can be grown in allotment patches (2) with level 61 Farming. Ranarr weed
Limpwurt root Can be grown in flower patches (1) with level 26 Farming. Kwuarm
Tirannwn✓ Zulrah's scales Can be obtained from killing Zulrah or fishing sacred eels with level 87 Fishing. Antidote++
Swamp tar Can be obtained from killing Zulrah in increments of 1,000. Harralander
Eye of newt Can be purchased at Prifddinas Herbal Supplies. Irit
Snape grass Can be grown in allotment patches (2) with level 61 Farming. Ranarr weed
Limpwurt root Can be grown in flower patches (1) with level 26 Farming. Kwuarm
Wilderness✓ Red spiders' eggs Can be obtained from Venenatis. Snapdragon
Mort myre fungus Can be obtained from Vet'ion. Avantoe
Limpwurt root Can be obtained from Venenatis, Vet'ion, and Callisto. Kwuarm
Unicorn horn dust Can be obtained from Venenatis. Irit

Potions[edit | edit source]

Not all potions are easily creatable or obtainable with all region unlock combinations. In particular, the ranging potion, super attack potion, and antifire potion have rigid region requirements due to the scarcity of their secondary ingredients.

Secondary ingredients locations[edit | edit source]

The following table lists sources for secondary ingredients in the starting area if available, and common sources from other areas:

Secondary Potions made Level Primary How to obtain
Eye of newt Attack potion 3 Guam potion (unf) Obtained in the starting area from catablepon or cave crawler drops. Easily obtained by purchasing eye of newt packs (contains 100) at the following shop locations.
Super attack 45 Irit potion (unf)
Unicorn horn dust Antipoison 5 Marrentill potion (unf) Obtained in the starting area from unicorns located South of Edgeville (2), Southeast of the Varrock mine (2), and West of Lumbridge (2). Easily obtained from unicows and Venenatis drops. Ground from unicorn horns.
Superantipoison 48 Irit potion (unf)
Limpwurt root Strength potion 12 Tarromin potion (unf) Obtained in the starting area from hobgoblin and hill giant drops. Can be farmed at flower patches from limpwurt seeds with level 26 Farming. No flower patches are available in the starting area.
Super strength 55 Kwuarm potion (unf)
Red spiders' eggs Restore potion 22 Harralander potion (unf) Obtained in the starting area from ground spawns located in the Varrock Sewers (2), and Crandor and Karamja Dungeon (2). Easily obtained from spidines and Venenatis drops.
Super restore 63 Snapdragon potion (unf)
Weapon poison+ 73 Coconut milk [1] and cactus spine [2]
Chocolate dust Energy potion 26 Harralander potion (unf) Obtained in the starting area from ground spawns located in the Cooks' Guild (1) and Zanaris (1), or purchased from the Culinaromancer's Chest. Most easily obtained by purchasing chocolate bars at the following shop locations. Ground from chocolate bars.
White berries Defence potion 30 Ranarr potion (unf) Obtained in the starting area from cave crawler drops. Can be farmed at bush patches with level 59 Farming.
Super defence 66 Cadantine potion (unf)
Snape grass Prayer potion 38 Ranarr potion (unf) Obtained in the starting area from cave crawler drops or eclectic implings. Can be farmed at allotment patches with level 61 Farming.
Fishing potion 50 Avantoe potion (unf)
Dragon scale dust Weapon poison 60 Kwuarm potion (unf) Unobtainable in the starting area. Only obtainable from the Myths' Guild basement+ or the Taverley Dungeon. Ground from blue dragon scales.
Antifire potion 69 Lantadyme potion (unf)
Yew roots Antidote+ 68 Coconut milk[1] and Toadflax Can be farmed at tree patches with level 60 Farming. Dug up from farmed yew trees after manually chopping them down.
Wine of zamorak Ranging potion 72 Dwarf weed potion (unf) Unobtainable in the starting area. Only obtainable from the following sources.
Potato cactus Magic potion 76 Lantadyme potion (unf) Unobtainable in the starting area. Only obtainable from the following sources.
Jangerberries Zamorak brew 78 Torstol potion (unf) Can be farmed at bush patches with level 48 Farming. Can also be looted from young implings (1/100) with level 22 Hunter.
Magic roots Antidote++ 79 Coconut milk[1] and Irit leaf Can be farmed at tree patches with level 75 Farming. Dug up from farmed magic trees after manually chopping them down.
Crushed nest Saradomin brew 81 Toadflax potion (unf) Obtained in the starting area from Bird house trapping or occasionally from Woodcutting. Easily obtained from Giant mole drop exchanges with Wyson the gardener. Ground from bird nests.
Lava scale shard Extended antifire 84 Antifire potion(4) Unobtainable in the starting area due to infernal eel fishing, which requires Ice glovesor and an Oily fishing rodoror. Easily obtained from Lava dragons. Ground from lava scales.
  1. ^ 1.0 1.1 1.2 Coconuts are farmable with level 68 Farming. It can also can be obtained from nature implings with level 58 Hunter.
  2. ^ Cactus spines are farmable at the cactus patch with level 55 Farming. It can also can be dropped by nature implings, requiring level 58 Hunter.

Restrictions[edit | edit source]

Certain potions have obscure region requirements in order to create them, due to quests or difficult to obtain ingredients.

Dwarf weed is useless, unless a player unlocks the Desert, Asgarnia, Morytania, or the Wilderness to access Wine of zamorak.

Lantadyme is useless, unless a player unlocks the Desert, Asgarnia, Morytania, or Myths' Guild+ to access Potato cactus or Dragon scale dust.

Potion Level Region Notes
Imp repellent 3 Varies Used with butterfly jars at the Rimmington Chemist's house to create impling jars. Butterfly jar limitation, see sources. Flowers may not be possible to obtain in starting region.
Relicym's balm 8 Kandarin✓ OR Morytania✓ Requires partial completion of Zogre Flesh Eaters.
Serum 207 15 Morytania✓ Requires completion of Shades of Mort'ton.
Guthix rest tea 18 Kandarin✓ Requires auto-unlock of One small favour.
Guthix balance 22 Morytania✓ Requires auto-unlock of In Aid of the Myreque.
Blamish oil 25 Morytania✓
Combat potion 36 Desert✓ OR Kandarin✓ OR Wilderness✓ Desert goat horn limitation, see sources.
Shrink-me-quick 52 Asgarnia✓ Requires partial completion of Grim Tales quest.
Hunter potion 53 Fremennik✓ Kebbit teeth limitation. Requires 51 Hunter.
Weapon poison 60 Asgarnia✓ OR Kandarin✓ Dragon scale dust limitation, see sources.
Sanfew serum 65 Kandarin✓ Morytania✓ Requires completion of Zogre Flesh Eaters. Nail beast nails limitation, requires Temple trekking.
Antifire potion 69 Asgarnia✓
OR
Kandarin✓ AND Fremennik✓ 		Dragon scale dust limitation, see sources.
Divine super attack potion 70 Tirannwn✓ Crystal dust limitation, see sources.
Divine super strength potion 70 Tirannwn✓ Crystal dust limitation, see sources.
Divine super defence potion 70 Tirannwn✓ Crystal dust limitation, see sources.
Ranging potion 72 Asgarnia✓ OR Morytania✓
OR
Wilderness✓ OR Desert✓
OR
Tirannwn✓		 Wine of zamorak limitation, see sources.
Divine ranging potion 74 Tirannwn✓ Wine of zamorak limitation, see sources. Crystal dust limitation, see sources.
Stamina potion 77 Asgarnia✓ Amylase crystal limitation, Marks of grace cannot be exchanged except with Grace.
Divine magic potion 78 Tirannwn✓ Crystal dust limitation, see sources.
Bastion potion 80 Morytania✓ Vial of blood limitation, requires completion of Theatre of blood.
Battlemage potion 80 Morytania✓ Vial of blood limitation, requires completion of Theatre of blood.
Extended antifire 84 Asgarnia✓
OR
Kandarin✓ AND Fremennik✓ 		Dragon scale dust limitation, see sources. Lava scale shard limitation, only obtainable from infernal eel fishing or Lava dragon.
Divine bastion potion 86 Morytania✓ Tirannwn✓ Vial of blood limitation, requires completion of Theatre of blood. Crystal dust limitation, see sources.
Divine battlemage potion 86 Morytania✓ Tirannwn✓ Wine of zamorak limitation, see sources. Vial of blood limitation, requires completion of Theatre of blood. Crystal dust limitation, see sources.
Anti-venom 87 Tirannwn✓ Zulrah's scales limitation, see sources.
Super antifire potion 92 Fremennik✓ AND Kandarin✓ Dragon scale dust limitation, see sources. Crushed superior dragon bones limitation, requires killing Vorkath. Players must speak with Primula (located in the Myths' Guild) to learn how to make super antifire potions.
Anti-venom+ 94 Tirannwn✓ Zulrah's scales limitation, see sources.
Divine super combat potion 97 Tirannwn✓ Crystal dust limitation, see sources.
Extended super antifire 98 Fremennik✓ AND Kandarin✓ Dragon scale dust limitation, see sources. Crushed superior dragon bones limitation, requires killing Vorkath. Lava scale shard limitation, only obtainable from infernal eel fishing or Lava dragons. Players must speak with Primula (located in the Myths' Guild) to learn how to make extended super antifire potions.


Other equipment[edit | edit source]

Item Region Notes
Amulet of chemistry Karamja✓ While equipped, a player mixing potions has a 5% chance to create a (4) dose potion instead of a (3) dose potion, consuming a charge. Maximum 5 charges. Requires level 27 Magic and level 37 Crafting to create. Amulet mould requires level 44 Construction or additional region unlocks to obtainor.

Temporary boosts[edit | edit source]

Item Region Notes
Spicy stew (brown spice) Desert✓ Boosts Herblore by ±0-5. Requires manual completion of the Freeing Evil Dave subquest in Recipe for Disaster.
Greenman's ale Kandarin✓ Fremennik✓ Boosts Herblore by 1. Can be obtained from Rasolo the Wandering Merchant, the Dragon Inn, or The Lighthouse Store. Otherwise requires the Morytania or Fremennik region to brew with level 29 Cooking.
Greenman's ale(m) Morytania✓ Fremennik✓ Boosts Herblore by 2. Requires the Morytania or Fremennik region to brew with level 29 Cooking, more easily produced by using the stuff from Trouble Brewing.

Skillcape[edit | edit source]

Item Region Seller Notes
Herblore Cape Asgarnia✓ Kaqemeex Obtain a pestle and mortar. While equipped, players can use grimy herbs to create unfinished potions.

Players will have a [[pestle and mortar]] included in their starting equipment. A player may wish to wear an [[amulet of chemistry]] while mixing potions for a 5% chance of obtaining (4) dose potions instead of (3). [[Herblore]] is modified by two [[Trailblazer_League#Tier_1_relics|tier 1 relics]]. * [[Trailblazer_League#Endless_Harvest|Endless Harvest]] is not directly beneficial to [[Herblore]] training, as it does not improve [[Farming]] or other herb gathering activities. * [[Trailblazer_League#Production_Master|Production Master]] allows players to mix an inventory of potion ingredients instantly. * [[Trailblazer_League#Skilling_Prodigy|Skilling Prodigy]] allows players to bypass low-level and low XP content. ==Training== The most useful potions to create for training purposes are the [[prayer potion]], [[super attack]], [[super strength]], [[super defence]], [[super restore]], and [[saradomin brew]]. Alternatively, players may train by creating [[Herblore_training#Making_Tar|herb tar]] although it will be difficult to obtain enough [[swamp tar]] to sustain this method. [[Water-filled vial pack]]s may be purchased in the starting area from [[Jiminua's Jungle Store]] or [[Obli's General Store]], see [[Water-filled_vial_pack#Shop_locations|additional sources]]. [[Zahur]]{{TBIcon|Desert}} may be paid 200 GP per item to clean herbs and create [[unfinished potion]]s. ===Obtaining herbs=== [[Herb]]s are most easily obtained in the starting region from the [[Herbiboar]] [[hunter]] activity on [[Fossil Island]]. Otherwise players will be limited to uncommon monster drops until they are able to unlock additional regions with [[herb patches]] or monsters with more common herb drops. ====Herb patches==== Maximum: 6 * Asgarnia, Kandarin, and Morytania. {{plinkp|Superantipoison}} [[Irit]] |} ==Potions== Not all potions are easily creatable or obtainable with all region unlock combinations. Ground from [[lava scale]]s. |} ===Restrictions=== Certain potions have obscure region requirements in order to create them, due to quests or difficult to obtain ingredients. [[Dwarf weed]] is useless, unless a player unlocks the Desert, Asgarnia, Morytania, or the Wilderness to access [[Wine of zamorak]]. [[Lantadyme]] is useless, unless a player unlocks the Desert, Asgarnia, Morytania, or [[Myths' Guild]]{{TBIcon|Kandarin}}+{{TBIcon|Fremennik}} to access [[Potato cactus]] or [[Dragon scale dust]]. {|class="wikitable sortable" ! colspan=2 | Potion !!
